personalInfo.name: Aditya Kendre
personalInfo.bio: Scaling ideas while learning and building cool things - founding team at Semant and Gaudiya Kirtan.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Software Engineer at Meta building Dynamic Ads - our systems match millions of products to users in real-time, driving $15B annual revenue.

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer
experience.description: Lead engineer for a music library and streaming platform with 10K+ users.

experience.title: Research Engineer
experience.description: Research engineer for projects on system design (os + distributed) and machine learning; worked on memory allocators, scheduling policies, architecture pipelining, and edge computing.

experience.title: AI Software Engineer
experience.description: AI software engineer for the Global Innovation Team; worked on model alignment, computer vision pipelines, full-stack applications, and a blockchain network.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experience.description: Machine learning engineer for the AI team; worked on object detection for defects in garments, data augmentation, and scaling data collection with AWS.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Software engineering intern for the full stack team, worked on API design and user experience for property management tool.

experience.title: Undergraduate Researcher
experience.description: Undergraduate researcher working on brain network analysis with EEG and MRI data to synthesize connectome data to train deep learning models for emotion recognition.

projects.title: Readsome - a reading app
description: An app that helps you achive your reading goals with state-of-the-art speach synthesis.

projects.title: Semant Search - an answer engine
description: An LLM first-engine built to give answers with access to websites, books, videos, and much more.

projects.title: Heart Sound Abnormality Detection
description: Developed an app to detect heart sound abnormality with a novel (CNN+transformer) model - International ISEF Finialist 2021

publications.title: Beluga: Boosted Explanatory Learning Using GPT Assistance
Structure-Preserving Graph Kernel for Brain Network Classification
publications.venue: IEEE International Symposium on Biomedical Imaging (ISBI)

publications.title: Computer Audition Arrhythmia Classification in Heart Sounds
